releases.summary: This release squashes a handful of bugs and tidies things up.
releases.seoSummary: Bug fixes for the Stuga Home Assistant dashboard app, improving device settings persistence and external link handling on iOS and Android.

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed device settings (like device type) not saving properly when navigating between screens
Fixed external links not opening correctly on iOS and Android
Removed an empty "Other" tab that could appear when your home has no floors set up

releases.summary: This update fixes a couple of annoying bugs to make things smoother.
releases.seoSummary: Fixes floor swiping and room card display issues in the Home Assistant mobile dashboard for a smoother navigation experience.

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed swiping between floors on the Favorites tab
Fixed the selection ring not showing correctly on room cards

releases.summary: This release brings a smoother experience when organizing your favorites.
releases.seoSummary: Improved favorites organization in the Home Assistant dashboard with smoother reordering and simplified custom order settings.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Added a loading indicator when toggling custom order on or off
Simplified settings with a single "Custom room & device order" option

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed an issue where items would jump around when reordering favorites
Improved visual consistency in favorites edit mode

releases.summary: This update brings the all-new Favorites view – a dedicated tab where you can pin your most-used devices and scenes for quick access. We're also rolling out a few improvements from earlier today that you might have missed.
releases.seoSummary: Introducing the Favorites tab to quickly control your most-used Home Assistant devices and scenes. Drag and drop to organize lights, switches, sensors, and more across your smart home dashboard.

sections.title: New Features
items: Favorites tab for instant access to your most important controls
Drag and drop to reorder devices, scenes, and sensors in any room
Select multiple items and move them together
Choose to keep your room and device order local or sync it to Home Assistant (Settings → Advanced)
The first temperature sensor now shows on the room card
News section in settings to stay up to date with Stuga
Quick links to give feedback and join discussions (Settings menu)

sections.title: Improvements
items: Faster dashboard loading with cached layouts
Smoother login flow with instant redirect after connecting
Clearer indication of where hidden devices are synced
Simplified room order settings
Better visual feedback when selecting multiple devices

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed crash on Huawei and other non-Google Play Services Android devices

releases.summary: This update brings a much-requested feature: you can now reorder devices, scenes, and sensors within your rooms! We've also added a news section to settings and made several quality-of-life improvements.
releases.seoSummary: Customize your Home Assistant dashboard layout with drag-and-drop reordering for devices, scenes, and temperature sensors within rooms.

sections.title: New Features
items: Drag and drop to reorder devices, scenes, and sensors in any room
Choose to keep your room and device order local or sync it to Home Assistant via labels (Settings → Advanced)
The first temperature sensor will be the one that shows in the room card
Select multiple items and move them together
News section in settings to stay up to date with Stuga

sections.title: Improvements
items: Clearer indication of where hidden devices are synced
Simplified room order settings
Better visual feedback when selecting multiple devices

releases.summary: This release brings a refreshed settings experience and several quality-of-life improvements.
releases.seoSummary: Redesigned settings menu and improved touch-friendly room reordering for the Home Assistant smart home dashboard.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Settings now opens as a full-screen menu sliding in from the right for easier navigation
Settings button moved to the top-right corner with a cleaner icon
Added a logout option when connection is lost, so you can switch servers more easily
Improved room reordering with better touch-based swiping
Cleaner layout when your home doesn't have multiple floors

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed rooms sometimes not appearing when assigned to a missing floor
Hidden technical entities (config/diagnostic) that aren't meant for daily use

releases.summary: This release brings temperature display improvements and better support for Android sideloading.
releases.seoSummary: Manage temperature sensors in Celsius or Fahrenheit on your Home Assistant dashboard, with new Android APK sideloading support.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Temperature now displays in your preferred unit (Celsius or Fahrenheit) based on your Home Assistant settings
Android users can now download the APK directly for sideloading or use with Obtainium

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Removed accidental advertising ID from Android manifesto

releases.summary: This release brings temperature display improvements and better support for Android sideloading.
releases.seoSummary: Temperature sensor display now respects your Home Assistant unit preferences, plus direct APK downloads for Android sideloading.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Temperature now displays in your preferred unit (Celsius or Fahrenheit) based on your Home Assistant settings
Android users can now download the APK directly for sideloading or use with Obtainium

releases.summary: Control which smart home devices appear in your Home Assistant dashboard with new device visibility options.
releases.seoSummary: Control which smart home devices appear on your Home Assistant dashboard with new visibility settings to hide lights, switches, and sensors in Stuga or Home Assistant.

sections.title: New Features
items: You can now choose to hide devices either just in Stuga or in Home Assistant too - giving you more control over what shows up where

sections.title: Improvements
items: Better error messages when there are SSL/TLS or DNS connection issues, making it easier to troubleshoot connection problems

releases.summary: Improved Home Assistant connection setup with smarter URL detection for both local and remote access.
releases.seoSummary: Smarter Home Assistant connection setup with automatic URL detection, making it easier to connect your smart home dashboard over local or remote access.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Smarter URL handling when setting up your connection - the app now automatically tries different protocols (http/https) and suggests alternatives if your initial URL doesn't work
When multiple connection options are found, you can now easily pick the one that works best for you

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed an issue where the setup wizard wouldn't scroll properly when the keyboard appeared
Fixed a timing issue that could cause connection testing to behave unexpectedly

releases.summary: Stability improvements and bug fixes for the Home Assistant dashboard app on Android devices.
releases.seoSummary: Stability improvements for the Home Assistant dashboard on Android, fixing Huawei compatibility, slider controls, and touch interactions on mobile.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Added connection diagnostics to help troubleshoot connectivity issues
Updated privacy policy to reflect our crash reporting practices

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Fixed compatibility issues on Huawei Android 12 devices
Fixed modal sheets sometimes closing unexpectedly when swiping
Fixed slider controls flickering while dragging
Fixed icon picker scrolling issues on Android
Fixed room card layout and sizing inconsistencies

releases.summary: Display temperature and humidity sensors in your Home Assistant room cards with new customization options.
releases.seoSummary: Display temperature and humidity sensors on Home Assistant room cards, customize which lights and switches are included in room toggles, and enjoy a cleaner dashboard layout.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Redesigned floor editing with a cleaner, more intuitive interface
Room cards now show humidity alongside temperature
New settings to show or hide temperature and humidity in room cards
You can now exclude specific lights or switches from the room toggle
Simplified grid layout with a cleaner 2-column default

sections.title: Bug Fixes
items: Switches now behave correctly based on their device type when toggling rooms

releases.summary: Organize your smart home by floors with improved navigation and editing in the Home Assistant dashboard.

releases.summary: Drag and drop room organization for your Home Assistant dashboard with multi-select and cross-floor support.
releases.seoSummary: Organize your Home Assistant dashboard with drag-and-drop room management, multi-select support, and the ability to move rooms between floors.

sections.title: Improvements
items: Added multi-room drag selection with visual stacking when selecting multiple rooms
Added ghost placeholders showing where rooms will be placed during drag
Added ability to drag rooms between floors by holding over a floor tab
